notes.text:
This update for python-pycryptodome fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-52323: Fixed side-channel leakage in RSA decryption by using constant-time (faster) padding decoding for OAEP (bsc#1218564).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: PyCryptodome and pycryptodomex before 3.19.1 allow side-channel leakage for OAEP decryption, exploitable for a Manger attack.
notes.title: CVE description
